alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Clinch; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 10:57PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, west central Camden, southwestern Brantley, central Ware, east central Clinch and Charlton Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1056 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles north of Fargo to 7 miles southwest of Hilliard. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Hilliard, Folkston, Stephen Foster State Park, Homeland, Boggy Bay, Manor, Braganza, Race Pond, Needham and Winokur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Clinch; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
